name: Stars of the Lid
description: '''Stars of the Lid''' is an American [[ambient music]] project that formerly consisted of [[Brian McBride (musician)|Brian McBride]] and [[Adam Wiltzie]]. The duo formed in [[Austin, Texas]], in 1992. They have been acclaimed for their music incorporating droning, effects-treated guitars along with piano, strings, and horns, described as "divine, classical drone without the tedious intrusion of drums or vocals." After McBride's death in 2023, Wiltzie remains the sole member.
